Title: V/H/S Viral
Director: Justin Benson, Gregg Bishop, Todd Lincoln, Aaron Moorhead, Marcel Sarmiento, Nacho Vigalondo
Writer: T.J. Cimfel, David White, Marcel Sarmiento, Gregg Bishop, Nacho Vigalondo, Justin Benson, Brad Miska (concept: anthology concept), Todd Lincoln (segment)
Actors: Patrick Lawrie, Emilia Ares, Celia K. Milius, Steve Berens
Plot: A Los Angeles police chase sends a fame-obsessed man on a wild ride to save his girlfriend from a cybernetic terror.
